website_summaries.verdict: Shout has designed a nice gel laundry stick with a scrubber applicator.
pros: Includes a little brush on the end to help lift the stains
Does well if you run the item through twice
cons: Not as effective as some on getting out grease
Works better than the spray version of Shout

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spots on just about any thing dab ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spots on just about any thing dab it on the spot wait a min or two then use the provided scrubber let it sit at least a few hours then wash. It works on most stains but I have found that it does not work on ink, koolade, blood, crystal light ,grape or red juice ,beats, red wine or dried fleeces . Other than the feeces alcohol sparkling water and or vinegar and peroxide work best. What it is good for is keeping the stain from setting. You just have to use the appropriate cleaner for these spots . I like it because it's small enough to be mobile.
customer_reviews.author: GRANGRANB

customer_reviews.title: Best for Any stain, but follow instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, and magic....but only if used correctly. For any stain, most important - do not try to rub out with anything else. You have to wait to put on stain before washing, depending on quality of fabric use warm or cold wash.. If rarely item comes out wet with any little stain left, do not put in dryer. Put more on and wash again... I use on carpets, furniture etc. Don't worry about blue color, it will go away with wash or water. But hands down best stain remover around, especially for whites. The spray and detergent version to use on whites is best. I recommend warm, not hot water - unless you want shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: Norwaygirl

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the king of staining his clothes. I don't know how he does it and I don't know why he does it but he keeps me busy finding solutions for the next stain. The other day he dumped out a box of my stuff that had makeup in it in search for God knows what, and ended up staining our white bed sheets. I used this shout on the stain which got most of the color out and followed it with bleach in the wash. Worked like a charm! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sayurichan

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat less perfumy than Sprayable Stain Removers... AND it WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Works as well or better than sprayable stain removers. Love the brush on the cap so you can rub it into the fabric without getting your hands goopy. I spill food on my chest a lot and have to use a generous amount of sprayable stain removers on my shirts. Those shirts still smell like strong perfume after washing, to the point where I have to wash them a 2nd or even 3rd time with unscented detergents to get rid of the smell of the Shout or Spray and Wash! No perfume smell on shirts after 1 washing, so no extra washing needed for those with fragrance sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Love the bottle, but doesn’t work for anything we need it to work on.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff gets NOTHING out for our family. Coffee, dirt, wine, ice cream etc. you name it, it doesn’t work. I love the bottle, and keep trying to use it, but always have to go back to oxy clean or some weird soap bar that I HATE using, but it works. Cmon shout! Put that soap bar stuff in liquid form in your bottle! I need it! My son plays every sport with white pants. I need EASY that WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: elvispizza

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for removing ring-around-the-collar. Squeeze till you see a little gel, rub the whole length of the collar wait 15 minutes, put in washer watch stain fade away. On larger or more delicate areas I would use the spray and rub with fingers, because the brush might damage the fabric. I have not seen Shout formal fade any colors so far, not like that pen for stains.
customer_reviews.author: J.Appel

customer_reviews.title: New Shout Advanced
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different types of laundry with the worst type of filth one can imagine! I have used many store brands and online expensive brands over the years but, by mistake I found one of these bottles in a box gave to me from a garage sale. This was a surprise because it was the first I had seen this...I used it on some old stained up work jeans and was surprised on the job this new Shout accomplished. The bottle is easy to grip and scrub the stain in one motion while applying the gel to the stain. Give it a try and I believe you will be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: charlene sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid off all types of stains
customer_reviews.text: Gets rid of cooking oil, fruits all all type of food that has fallen onto our clothes. I typically put the product on the stain and let it sit until I do laundry even if it does not happen until 5 days later. I have used it on shirts, sweaters, pants,... I do not even look at what type of cloth I put it on. After regular laundry the stains are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Simplify

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I'll be the first to admit that I'm a sloppy eater and get food stains like tomato, olive oil, gravy, etc. on a lot of shirts. The product comes to the rescue every time. Apply it a day ahead of time so that it really soaks in to the spots. This is as close to 100% effective as you can get. I don't use anything else for stains. Can be applied up to a week ahead of time. I never had a ruined piece of clothing with this like I have with solvent based spot removers.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt S.

customer_reviews.title: Best stain removal I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: I knew it worked well after I washed my husband's stained shirt 3 different times using other stain removal products, dried the shirt and the stains were still visible.I think the stain was from food...salad dressing perhaps......I just received this Shout Advanced Ultra Gel, went back to the stained shirt, dabbed the gel on the stains, let the shirt sit overnight in the hamper...Next day, washed the shirt again with other dirty laundry and voila....all the stains were totally GONE!
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST STAIN REMOVER
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST STAIN REMOVER! I love this stuff. The scrubber on top is awesome. I had actually stained a pair of jeans. I washed and dried them and the stain was still there. I applied the Shout Advanced and re-washed it and you could even see the stain. It works well on oily stains too!!! If you have kids or are just messy I HIGHLY recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ring around the colar. Worked amazing on canvas shoes!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Perfect for ring around the colar. Scrubs it right out & I like that you can see it work before putting in the wash instead of having to wait till the wash is done to see if "it works". Also does not hurt the fabric. Worked amazing on canvas shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Joe S. Petrushkin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like this applicator better than the last stain remover I tried, and so far, it has gotten every stain out. I find that if I apply it and let the item sit for a day, then wash, I have very good success. Yes, it's expensive, but so are clothes!
customer_reviews.author: V. McMurray

customer_reviews.title: Removes stains
customer_reviews.text: I stain treat my daughter's clothes with this once a week before I wash all her clothes. The fragrance from the gel is so strong that I choose to pre-rinse her clothes with multiple stains before running them through the washer (otherwise all of the clothes take on the fragrance from the gel). Other than the fragrance draw back, this gel is super effective at removing stains. Pros: 1) Effectively removes stains that have been "sitting" for multiple days Cons: 1)Smells strong of whatever "fragrance" is used
customer_reviews.author: SafeMommy

customer_reviews.title: Gets out oil stains!
customer_reviews.text: At the advice of the wife of a car mechanic, I bought this product because I accidently spilled dirty motor oil all over my new jeans. I used the scrubber and followed the directions, and you can't see one bit of the oil that was on them. To get motor oil out of clothes, I wouldn't use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bush

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find, but it's the best!
customer_reviews.text: This gel is getting to be harder and harder to find in stores! I have used any number of other products that claim to be amazing, but none come close to this for grease and food stains etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebluesdancer

customer_reviews.title: No stain is too tuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many stain removers, but this is the best by far! I had given up on my skirt when I couldn't get the coffee stain out. After seeing how this got all of the grass stains out of my son's football pants, I had to try it on my skirt. It got that 2 year old coffee stain completely out. It's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R

customer_reviews.title: Ok no bulls*** this stuff is magic
customer_reviews.text: Again, my fiancé is a walking disaster. I have NO idea why he owns anything white but whatever besides the point. He managed to spill ketchup, wine, and idk doesn't matter those two alone was bad enough. After a mild meltdown (from him) I remembered I got this product in my pantry box which was ALSO a very exciting experience lol but I gave it a shot and the shirt came out PERFECT. idk what they put in it but I do not care it is magic in a bottle. Needless to say 1000/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shout Advanced Stain remover
customer_reviews.text: There is NOTHING better to remove set in stains. Even those who have been washed and dried several times. It is my go to stain remover. Very hard to find in stores. I grab it whenever I can.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: It works, but not on tough stain. I tried it on a white shirt with a collar became yellow due to sunscreen. I had to wash it 4 times before the stain went away.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuele Codega

customer_reviews.title: Laundry magic!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 kids. This is the only stuff that works! It gets out set in stains, new stains, red stains, and blue stains. I can fix almost any stain with this. There are some set in stains that don't come out. But this is the best stuff I've ever used. My kids think I'm a laundry wizard. This is a MUST HAVE for every laundry room
customer_reviews.author: Shelly K

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the others available (including any other shout product -- the resolve stick worked the best, but I can't find it anymore). Try not to squeeze, it took me a while to get the hang of it -- to keep it from oozing out when scrubbing with the brush.
customer_reviews.author: WA ll

customer_reviews.title: When my daughter comes home from school with grass stains ...
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter comes home from school with grass stains on her jeans I just use a little of this and it gets the stain right out. Shout, Shout, then it comes out! Works well on oil, ink and grass stains.
customer_reviews.author: SarahAnna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook with olive oil and unfortunately it has splashed on multiple shirts of mine. I have tried EVERYTHING to get it out (baking soda, oxyclean, stain stick, steam) and nothing worked until now! I scrubbed this stuff into the stain let it sit for about 3 days, washed and the stains were gone! The other thing it works really well on is baby stains. This thing has gotten out set it spit up, blow out, and food stains from many different shirts/onsies/dresses/pants some new and some that were hand-me-downs. You should really give this a try! (and no I don't get any money or free products from shout, though I wish I did!!)
customer_reviews.author: L. Neel

customer_reviews.title: Shout Advanced Attacks Collar Stains
customer_reviews.text: Shout Advanced Gel (8.7-ounce, park of 3) easily got rid of stains on shirt collars that had been sitting for a few days. The shirts that I used that had few stays of stains were an all-cotton (100%), then a few wrinkle-free and non-iron shirts (Brooks Brothers). The instructions on the bottle says: 1) open the bottle and squeeze onto stains, 2) use the red brush on the bottle to spread/scrub the gel, then 3) let it sit for 1 to 5 minutes then throw in the laundry. It even took out some stains that the laundry/washing failed to from a couple weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Merrick K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes I didn't realize that my clothing is dirty and have been sitting for a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: I had been using this product for some years now! It does get dirt or any staining products (wine, ketchup, etc) off my clothes! Sometimes I didn't realize that my clothing is dirty and have been sitting for a couple of days, STILL GETS THE DIRT OFF! This is my go-to item whenever my clothes have some things I really need to get out! I like how there is a brush on this bottle, therefore I can use this any fabric, including my car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Becky W

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I had a stain on an athletic shirt that several rounds in the washer hadn't been able to get out. One time applying this stuff and boom! the stain was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis J.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. I was about to pack up my kitty's little hobo knapsack and send him packing. I took my mattress pad off to wash it and within that two hour window, my little bundle of joy hacked up a hairball on the mattress. I used the Shout gel and within 5 minutes, the stain was gone. My mattress is as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Petrushka

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t take any stains out. I had spattered grease and tomato stains. It did nothing. I hear oxy clean is better I’m going to try that
customer_reviews.author: Connie Lusk

customer_reviews.title: Got ink out of white lab coats
customer_reviews.text: Saved my white lab coats. I thought my white lab coats where ruined after a black pen leaked. After brushing in the shout and letting it soak, the ink came out in the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stain lifter works for tough stains. I apply directly to the stain and then put the garment into the washing machine and wash as usual. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product 😁
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I can recommend without any caution. I have used it on everything except delicate fabrics (silk, etc.). If you follow directions, you should have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great scrubber
customer_reviews.text: Love the little scrubber feature. Really helps the stain fighting detergent get into the stsin deeper.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo Stein

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend- especially for parents of infants
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I especially love the built-in scrubber. It eliminates the need for a separate sponge/cloth to scrub the clothes with, so clean-up stays clean. (It was easy to rinse off the few times the scrubber looked slightly dirty or if too many suds built up.) I was amazed how well this worked on baby poop. Thankfully we are past that phase now, but I still like to keep some on hand as it does work on other types of stains too. I always picked this up at my local store, but when they stopped carrying this kind with the brush on top, I turned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Check if works right as soon as delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Product came faulty, when turned upside down to use brush, all the liquid pours out. Does get stains out. Discovered after return date.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Angell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t remove food grease stains.
customer_reviews.text: Did not remove food grease stains and I applied liberally. Very disappointed going back to the can of Shout or Goop.
customer_reviews.author: PCK

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Bad Moment
customer_reviews.text: I love this product overall, but this purchase was a little rough. When I got it, liquid had spilled from the bottle, and onto the label and body of the bottle, making it greasy to handle and the label got damaged. Additionally, the plastic wrapping was partially cut, leaving the box a little wet.
customer_reviews.author: Kale!

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions, check, stains gone? no
customer_reviews.text: Tried to get out coffee stains by following the directions but nothing changed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a sticker over the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the seller's sticker over the instructions. Removing the sticker peeled the instruction text of the bottle. WTF!? Unscented, so great.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Good price, many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for grass stains, even used it to get a small stain out of a couch cushion
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT GOODGAME

customer_reviews.title: Must have for EVERY laundry room!
customer_reviews.text: My FAVORITE stain remover...not only because it's fantastic at removing stains and dirt...but because it's got a soft plastic bristle head which allows you to "Scrub' the area too!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great stain fighter!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great and the top stain scrubber is really great for deep set in stains.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie kridler

customer_reviews.title: grease eraser
customer_reviews.text: Grease and red wine stain eraser, but may take two washings. Difficult to find in stores. Worth the cost. Shout spray doesn't work anywhere as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Just like mom.
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of 3 stains happen. My mom has been using this for years. I have tried more natuRal products and they are okay but this is the best. I usually put some on the stain and let it set but occasionally I just dab it on right before I wash and still have great results. It's hard to find in stores at times so I was excited to find it here and got it in my prime pantry box. I will continue to use for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew & Jaymie

customer_reviews.title: Guys Mess
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of shirts that I have washed a number of times but couldn't get some stains off some of my favorite dark shirts. I decided to give this a shot since most of the shout products got good reviews . I'm happy to say that all three items that I couldn't get the stains out were all washed out after I put a little shout on and scrubbed it for about a minute. I'm glad to be wearing my favorite shirt and another shirt of more importance than just the look. I would recommend for anyone that is a little messy and gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: I just can't imagine doing laundry without this. But ...
customer_reviews.text: I just can't imagine doing laundry without this. But I learned few things from some mistakes. Do put Shout Advanced Gel into the stain without trying anything (no soaking or hand wash) and leave it over the night or a day but don't leave more than that. Then put it washing machine or hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid55

customer_reviews.title: I love the scrubby brush end
customer_reviews.text: I love the scrubby brush end! I bought this and then realized that I don't get that many stains, it is good for (cat puke) stains, which I sadly know too much about.
customer_reviews.author: et al

customer_reviews.title: Effective Stain Remover Without Overpowering Scent!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. I had been using Oxi Clean Max Force Gel Stick, which worked really well, but the overpowering perfume smell was more than I could tolerate. This Shout Gel works equally well with no sickly sweet smell. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: Gel + brush = awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have really missed using one of these and am glad that I tried Shout with the brush on top again. I tried using a dish brush on my husband's shirts but the bristles damaged the fabric over time. These plastic bristles do the job and get the cleaner into the fabric so the stains will release. And I love having gel to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pope

customer_reviews.title: I love that there isn't a strong smell to it
customer_reviews.text: I have had success in using this product to get stains out. If the stain is a hard one to get out, I'll rub this product on it, wait a few days and rub more on. I love that there isn't a strong smell to it! This is the only stain remover product I use.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Doty

customer_reviews.title: Takes out tough stains
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It removes stains fantastically well especially when used in combination with Oxyclean. I was amazed what it removed. The gel is a great viscosity. It will soak into the fabric, but it will not run everywhere. The spout has a built-in plastic brush tip that lets you scrub the area a bit. I have used spray and wash sticks before, but I think this product is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Tortuga V.

customer_reviews.title: Stain Remover
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Nothing else works as well to get stains out of kid clothes (so, ketchup, grass, dirt, chocolate milk, mustard...). Works even on "set in" stains that have been through the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: K Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for removing spots and stains.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to remove stains. I gather a batch of shirts and pre-treat. I use Resolve Max Laundry Stain Remover Pre Treat ( for collar and cuff rings. I wait one day then soak for another day in bucket of luke-warm water with a mix of Oxiclean (or Sun-Oxi), TSP (because I have a septic tank, not city sewer), and Wal-Mart GV detergent. Next, I remove each shirt and place in the washing machine (without more chemicals). Finally, I air-dry and iron.
customer_reviews.author: packrat0x

customer_reviews.title: One of the better stain removers
customer_reviews.text: One of the better stain removers. Like the brush on the product so you can work on a stain and it seems to get out the stains I have used it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Removes petroleum/grease/oil on *some* fabrics
customer_reviews.text: My bf has to put medicated petroleum (like Vaseline Jelly) on his torso, so of course it gets on his shirts. Shout Advanced Gel worked on the all-cotton shirts, but not on the mixed fabric shirts. Boo! The *best stuff* that always works is: Resolve Max Laundry Stain Remover Pre Treat, Stain Stick but it is difficult to apply over a large area.
customer_reviews.author: DJPinSF

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I JUST LOVE SHOUT IN THIS BRUSH BOTTLE. THE BRUSH PUTS THE SHOUT RIGHT INTO THE FIBERS OF THE GARMENTS. I DO NOT CARE FOR THE SPRAYS. WITH THE BRUSH I CONTROL THE AMOUNT I WANT & ONE THE EXACT SPOT I WANT IT ON. VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: CRAZYCAT

customer_reviews.title: Got out a stain that had been on a shirt ...
customer_reviews.text: Got out a stain that had been on a shirt for some time. I didn't think I'd ever get it out. This works!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Reed

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I had a large set in stain on one of my favorite polo shirts. The shirt had been washed several times and another product was not effective. The first application of this product saw the stain starting to fade. On the 5th application it was totally gone and the shirt looked like new. I will be pretreaing with this in the future and I know that if I miss a stain before washing that there is still hope.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for tough stains
customer_reviews.text: My mom swears by this, so of course I would also buy it. It's great for tough stains, and the brush head is really useful. I usually treat the stain area and leave it soaking until laundry day.
customer_reviews.author: cstar

customer_reviews.title: Takes Out All Stains
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this gel. It gets out every stain, much better then any other product that I have tried, it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela Montello

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Arrived all dispersed inside the bag. Not even useable!!!
customer_reviews.author: JCREFLECT

customer_reviews.title: Gets out set stains!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well it gets out old set stains.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Jennings

customer_reviews.title: I like the attachment scrubber on top
customer_reviews.text: I usually use an Oxyclean product so I was nervous to try a new stain remover. I have 2 toddlers and lots of stains. I like the attachment scrubber on top. I usually skip it for easy stains but the ones that have dried I use the scrubber on. So far so good! It's removed all the food stains I've tried it on.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great product on ski lift drips
customer_reviews.text: This Shout formula works great. We have it for the primary purpose of getting the chair lift grease/dirt drips off ski clothes. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Maven of Mortar

customer_reviews.title: buy two, you will use them everywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: the BEST stain remover on the planet. i couldnt find it in a store for years. the sprays and solids never worked like this stuff....
customer_reviews.author: Suesan A. Arth

customer_reviews.title: This stain remover is the only one that will get ...
customer_reviews.text: This stain remover is the only one that will get out blood, grease, and other stains that have been through the dryer. Seriously, it has saved me so much money in needing to replace or dry clean my clothes. It takes out everything due to the enzymatic action. I have tried the spray as it is a bit cheaper but it is not the same formula (see the MSDS) and does not work as well. This stuff is an essential at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindlenit

customer_reviews.title: A great value.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The gel is best,as it sticks to the stain .very economical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Works every time . . . unless you forget to use it (user problem!)
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just be careful because it comes fast outta the bottle. It has the scrubber top, which works nice. It hasn’t met a stain yet that it hasn’t taken out!
customer_reviews.author: ScrappyKel

customer_reviews.title: Ring around the washing machine
customer_reviews.text: This gel made it startlingly clear to me that the neck of my shirts are not, in fact, supposed to be a more sickly yellow than the rest of the shirt. It also made it clear how much my neck sweats. Thanks a lot, Shout Advanced Gel, 1 bottle, 8.7 fl oz, for making it abundantly and painfully obvious how disgusting my body is.
customer_reviews.author: MilfordMan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Used this last night on chocolate fudge bar drips. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Chambra

customer_reviews.title: Worked pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well - took out most stains in my underwear but not all.
customer_reviews.author: John Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Shout gets it out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with medium expectations, so far it has had a stellar performance. It does get out old stains, even set in ones. Works great on tough stains, compared to the store brand this is well worth the money. Save money on clothes by removing stains!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy.C.

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to get tough stains out (even old ones)...
customer_reviews.author: NelM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps up with my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. I have a three year old and the messes that go along with it. I've yet to find anything this product won't take out. Mud, tomato sauce, pudding, yogurt, BBQ, this cleaner has done them all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Devenberg

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've used this stain remover since my daughter was born, and this stuff works like a charm. I generally apply it right to a stain, wait about 5 minutes, then rinse and re-apply. From there I generally throw the item in the laundry until I'm ready to wash the load. When following this routine, I have yet to lose to a stain. Best feature? There's no need to touch the - ahem - offending substance that caused the stain in the first place. The bristles at the top of the bottle do all the scrubbing work for you! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product gives great results and truly gets the stains out! Great smelling and the pre-treating is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug63

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! It gets out sweat stains (most of the time at least) and even blood! I saved a many pair of underwear with this product as well! I can't believe I haven't discovered it sooner! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on a stain that i could not get out with other products and the stain did not budge. And the stain was not one that was set in by heat. Folliwed instructions to the letter.
customer_reviews.author: QueenDee

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It gets out a lot of stains! Also loveee the little scrub brush that comes on top
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Wood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it today on some grease. It all came out. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Works great on canvas shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to remove a spilled chocolate milkshake from my favorite pastel pink shoes. Now they look good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Ok

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This did not do much for us! Not as good as oxyclean or spray and wash. I do like the brush tip though. Won't be buying again
customer_reviews.author: MacDaddysMommy1

customer_reviews.title: Helpful! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great taking out stains. I especially like it for taking out and preventing deodorant stains on the underarms of my shirts. Comes in handy during baseball season, too :) Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collar Stains. Gone.
customer_reviews.text: I had set in ring around the collar stains that never came out using various methods. I lay my shirt collars flat on a surface, squeezed the bottle across the collar and used the bristle/brush to scrub the gel into the stains. I threw them all into the wash in warm water and the stains are almost gone. Using this product has removed 90% of my collar stains and if I do it again I'm confident it will get the rest out. Amazing product and I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be larger but I guess more concentrated? We'll see how it works soon.
customer_reviews.author: MSMaggie

customer_reviews.title: works great, but so much is wasted
customer_reviews.text: comes out very fast. works great, but so much is wasted... you cant use the scrubby end and control the amount of contents coming out... they need to fix that
customer_reviews.author: SUNSET SHOPPERS

customer_reviews.title: Works on tough stains!
customer_reviews.text: The best stain remover I’ve found. Oils. Coffee. Blood. Does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Leah L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just used this Shout Gel and I am very happy with it. It is so easy to use with the brush. It is wonderful to be able to apply whenever I want. The spots really come out. Much better in every way than the liquid Shout I was using. Love products that work and make life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: lhm

customer_reviews.title: Removes stains!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I like how you don't have to spray it (the sprays never quite work right unless you hold the bottle exactly right) and that it has the little scrubber thing to really work it into the stain. Removes stains better than anything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: who_kares

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I prefer Spray n Wash sticks so I can pre-spot the stain and wash whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: this is great for getting out stains. Rub it on before throwing the item in the wash. it even gets out blood.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Shout 1, stains 0
customer_reviews.text: Stains don't stand a chance. Kids would be a great test for this but some adults can be too, including one in my household. Sometimes I wouldn't find the stain for a day or so but this still did the trick. No brainer, gotta have it.
customer_reviews.author: celinenme

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and there has never been a stain (grass, oil, cooking grease, blood, ink, etc.) that it couldn't remove.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Madl

customer_reviews.title: effective, love the scrubby bristles
customer_reviews.text: Shout has always been my go-to remover for tough stains. I really like the little scrubby bristles on top of the dispenser. Same thick gel formula as always.
customer_reviews.author: Psyphyr

customer_reviews.title: Gets Out Baby Food!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to stain fighter. Love that I can get it through Amazon Prime Pantry now. I use this to treat any stain that's been set-in when I've overlooked a stain and sent an article of clothing through the dryer. Love how it works on baby food stains.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Spot Remover (After the Fact)
customer_reviews.text: I used this the other day to get a set in grease stain out of a shirt and it worked. Usually after a shirt has been through the wash and dryer the stain is there for life, but I must say, the stain came out. So I would say this product is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Fletch

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can treat your clothes and then wash them later, unlike with other stain removers where you have to treat it right before washing. This works really well, I guess I never realized it but I spill food/drink/etc on myself all of the time and I would be lost without this product.
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Shout Advanced Stain Remover with Scrubber
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on my husband's work clothes. It really helps get stains and grease out.
customer_reviews.author: Antique Car

customer_reviews.title: Great for stains
customer_reviews.text: Great gel that cleans all stains in my laundry. Easy to use and works every time
customer_reviews.author: Calinan

product_meta.title: Shout Advanced Gel, 8.7-Ounce (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Size:8.7 Ounce (Pack of 3)| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingShout Advanced Ultra Gel Brush combines powerful Shout stain fighters with a stain-lifting brush to penetrate and remove your toughest stains.
feature_bullets: Combines powerful Shout stain fighters in a thick gel formula with a convenient stain-lifting brush to penetrate and remove your toughest stains.
Built-in brush makes treating stains easy. Lets you treat stains now and wash up to a week later.
